title_suffix.comment: Added at the end of the title and highlighted in a different color

page_size.comment: The number of collection items to list per page

logo_url.comment: Link for the logo in the top left of the footer

copyright.comment: Automatically prefixed with the current year

page_description.comment: Defaults to the description set in the Site SEO data file

favicon_icon.comment: For the shortcut icon meta tag

featured_image.comment: Defaults to the image set in the Site SEO data file

author_twitter_handle.comment: Defaults to the twitter site value set in the Site SEO data file

no_index.comment: When selected this removes the page from your sitemap and adds the noindex robots meta tag

pages.title: Resource for maker to learn, sell & grow

seo.page_description: We believe that a good email marketing strategy is the key to growth. So we’re helping you grow your business with tools and resources that make email marketing easy.

content_blocks.title: On a mission to change email marketing
content_blocks.description: We're here to breathe new air into email marketing and help grow your business.

content_blocks.title: We love what we do
content_blocks.description: Our team has decades of experience working with email marketing campaigns and we’re passionate about helping you connect with your customers.

content_blocks.title: Built for your
content_blocks.description: We've built Sendit from the ground up the help grow your business faster.

content_blocks.title: Let's talk.
content_blocks.description: Have a question or suggestion? Feel free to drop us a message!

content_blocks.title: Run the best campaigns
content_blocks.description: Sendit will change the way you think about email and marketing automation.

content_blocks.title: Sendit
content_blocks.description: Sendit is the most complete solution to create beautiful email designs, manage mails and send them out at the best price.

content_blocks.title: Simply click and send
content_blocks.description: Make your message stand out, thanks to the guided copywriting and design features, triggering a positive response from your customers.

content_blocks.title: See every lead in one place
content_blocks.description: Sales analytics and automation made simple: see every sales lead in one place, regardless of where it came from.

content_blocks.title: Free templates to get you started
content_blocks.description: Sendit is used by everyone from small businesses to fortune 500 companies. Browse our collection of email marketing templates and start sending beautiful emails in minutes.

content_blocks.title: Build relationships that
content_blocks.description: Customers from around the world are building game changing email marketing campaigns.

slider.author: Pete Fish
slider.message: Sendit has taken Clear Appeal to the next level with it's beautiful targetted email campaigns.

slider.author: Dolly Watson
slider.message: Wow, what a difference Sendit has made. My customers are more engaged than ever.

slider.author: Simon Moriarty
slider.designation: Head of Marketing at Pinnacle Mines
slider.message: I can't imagine life without Sendit now, I have no idea how we were surviving before.

FAQ.title: Is there a maximum numbers of emails I can send each month?
FAQ.description: No, the prices include unlimited emails. Send to your heart's content.

FAQ.title: Where can I find out more information?
FAQ.description: Right here on this website, or contact our support team.

FAQ.title: Do you have pricing for non-profits?
FAQ.description: Yes, contact our support team and we'll get you set up on our non-profit plan.

FAQ.title: What forms of payment do you accept?
FAQ.description: We accept credit cards, checks, and cash.

FAQ.title: In which currencies can I make payments?
